name: PAX_JOURNEY_LIST_STRUCTURE
description: Defines the structure of the PaxJourneyList, which contains multiple PaxJourney nodes. Each PaxJourney includes a unique PaxJourneyID, a duration, and a reference to a PaxSegmentRefID, representing a complete journey definition.
prompt: Verify that each <PaxJourney> in <PaxJourneyList> contains a unique <PaxJourneyID>, a <Duration> in ISO 8601 format, and a <PaxSegmentRefID> that references a valid segment.
